alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Sullivan (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 28 at 7:35AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF SULLIVAN...DELAWARE... SOUTHERN WAYNE...WYOMING...SUSQUEHANNA...NORTHERN WAYNE...BRADFORD... AND LACKAWANNA COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow which will rapidly reduce visibility to less than a half mile. A quick inch of snow could fall with this snow band. This will lead to untreated surfaces becoming snow covered and slippery. Use caution and plan some extra time to reach your destination this morning. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 733 AM EST, a band of heavy snow was along a line extending from Peabrook to near Rushville and moving southeast at 15 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Rockland, Carbondale, Liberty, Bethel, Rush, Damascus, Jackson, Callicoon, Clifford, and Forest City. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 between 92 and 94, and between 102 and 103. Pennsylvania Interstate 81 between 201 and 223. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this band of heavy snow. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
